data.message: I just got it...all it did was put the groups I belong to in order in large buttons looks easier to navigate thru.  Didn't do anything to family friends..just what groups I belong to..

replies.message: That's right, Kelley! By creating a separate app, we are hoping people will be able to easily maneuver between their Groups, notifications and discovering more content.-Rose
I think I like it! I do thnk fb should bring back where you can not be searched...the blocking only goes so far some ppl create another fb..just to harass ppl. And I have been a victim of that.
